description: React component for a report detail page with editing, exporting, sharing, and AI summary features.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Saves the current report with updated fields by calling updateReport and shows a success toast.

methods.name: genSummary
methods.description: Generates a mock AI summary for the report and shows a toast indicating success.

methods.name: exportPdf
methods.description: Placeholder function to initiate PDF export, shows an info toast.

methods.name: share
methods.description: Placeholder function to share the report via email or Slack, shows an info toast.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Deletes the report, shows a success toast, and navigates back to the reports list.
